test.instr: (:ins (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X red) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (putdown X) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X red))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X yellow) (type Y container) (sort Y cupboard))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (type X container) (sort X cupboard))) (:info (plate X) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X yellow))) (:cons_not (:task (open X) (:cond (type X container) (sort X refrigerator)))) )
test.nl: Put the red can in the cupboard. Put down the red remotecontrol. The cupboard is closed. There is yellow cup on plate. Take out the yellow bottle from the cupboard. The refrigerator must not be opened.
